nodes.text: A shimmerbird tongue robe was a type of brown robe made from the tongues of shimmerbirds. Magistrate of the Corporate Alliance Passel Argente wore a shimmerbird tongue robe with a crocheted hood and the brooch of Luristan while attending a meeting of the Separatist Council on the planet Geonosis in 22 BBY.

A shimmerbird tongue robe first appeared in the 2002 prequel trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones. The prop was first identified in the 2017 reference book Star Wars: The Visual Encyclopedia.
